name: Personal accordion
author: Davide Brunner

sections.description:
P-accordion plug-in to easily add multiple accordions in your WordPress website.

Demo

https://davidebrunner.com/plung-in/p-accordion/#version

Features

– 100% responsive.
– Easy use and installation.
– Graphic user interface configuration CSS.
– Space optimization and fast loading.
– [Shortcode] API function.
– High performances in your page.
– Accordion tags and accordion categorie tags.
– Easy to customize and developer friendly.
– Dinamic css change.

Links

  • Author’s web site
  • Plugin’s page
  • FAQ
  • Support forum

Simple set up

Parameters:
title =”” text accordion.
titlecategorie=”” text title categorie.
addclass= “” add custom class title row.
panelclass= “” add custom class conteiner box.

Install

  1. Upload the p-accordion folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

example

copy and paste

[pp_accordion_categorie titlecategorie=”Categorie 1″]

[pp_accordion title=”section1″]
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. sections.faq:
• Q I can encapsulate other shortcodes ?

  • R shortcodes are interpreted.

  • Q It is possible to disable mouse-over?

  • R yes, inserting only # in the trans color.
sections.changelog:
1.1.20 Internationalization plug-in

1.1.21 Add plug-in documentation

1.1.22 Debug Scalia Theme

1.1.23 Optimization of javascript code

1.1.24 Add GUI admin plug-in
Add Dynamic style sheet
Add Multi-language support
Restyling logo and banner (thanks to Emiliano Zanetti)

short_description: P-accordion plug-in to easily add multiple accordions in your WordPress website.
